forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 21C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High near 70F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low around 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 21C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High around 70F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 21C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 69F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 12C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 54F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 22C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 72F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 23C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 74F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 56F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 21C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 69F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low near 55F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 22C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 71F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 21C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 71F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 21C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 71F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low around 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.
